title: Twitch skin is a waste :(
body: I mean, the pickpocket twitch skin is cool and all, but could it be more than just a base skin retexture, like the the little arrows that he shoots OR ATLEAST HIS TAUNT, IT MAKES NO DAMN SENSE. I know its a 750rp skin but rito ples{{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:29}}

replies.body: I literally just got it, and I thoroughly enjoy it, it's a nice cheap 5 dollar skin, is awesome.
